alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cumberland; Coastal Waldo; Knox; Lincoln; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 26 at 3:19PM EST until November 27 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO NOON EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Strong southeast flow ahead of low pressure tracking north through the area will combine with high astronomical tides to produce splashover and beach erosion, as well a s few areas of minor coastal flooding Monday morning. * WHERE...Coastal Cumberland, Sagadahoc, Lincoln, Knox and Coastal Waldo Counties. * WHEN...From 8 AM to noon EST Monday. * IMPACTS...A few roads may be closed with up to 1 foot of inundation expected in more vulnerable areas. Splashover and some beach erosion is likely. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Portland ME MLLW Categories - Minor 12.0 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 14.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 26/10 AM 10.7 1.0 -0.2 1 None 26/10 PM 9.6 -0.1 -0.1 2 None 27/10 AM 12.3 2.6 1.6 4-6 Minor 27/11 PM 9.5 -0.2 0.0 4-5 None 28/11 AM 10.5 0.8 -0.3 4 None Bath ME MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 26/11 AM 8.3 -1.4 -0.2 0 None 26/11 PM 7.1 -2.6 0.0 0 None 27/11 AM 10.0 0.3 1.5 0 None 28/12 AM 7.1 -2.6 0.1 0 None 28/12 PM 8.2 -1.5 -0.2 0-1 None Boothbay Harbor ME MLLW Categories - Minor 13.0 ft, Moderate 14.0 ft, Major 15.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.3 ft, Moderate 4.3 ft, Major 5.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 26/10 AM 10.3 0.6 -0.2 2 None 26/10 PM 9.3 -0.4 -0.1 3 None 27/10 AM 12.4 2.7 1.9 6-7 None 27/11 PM 9.3 -0.4 0.1 3 None 28/11 AM 10.2 0.5 -0.2 3 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
